title: Create Pod with Multiple Environment Variables
description: Create a Pod named ||multi-env-pod|| using image ||busybox:1.31.0|| with environment variables ||ENV1=value1||, ||ENV2=value2||, and command ||'sleep 3600'|| in the ||uranus|| namespace.

steps: kubectl exec multi-env-pod -n uranus -- env | grep ENV

validations.command: kubectl exec multi-env-pod -n uranus -- env | grep ENV1=value1
validations.description: Pod should have correct environment variables
